name: Space Freeze
overview: You're deep in the heart of space, patrolling the galaxy. Out of nowhere appears an enemy ship! But you are safe - your ship is equipped with a 21st century laser shield that instantly zaps any and ll intruders! Enemy ships are coming out of nowhere, flying faster and faster. If you're hit six times, you and your ship instantly freeze. Can you be fast enough to fire the laser and avoid the a frigid death? Get ready for your most spine-chilling space flight ever!
